thread.title: Michelle, Dearborn Heights, MI
thread.title_full: ezCater reviewed by Michelle, Dearborn Heights, MI

author: Michelle, Dearborn Heights, MI
title: Michelle, Dearborn Heights, MI
text: I ordered food for friends and family at a funeral viewing. Everything was delivered hot and fresh. I was thanked over and over, however I give the credit to this company and the restaurant I chose. I truly changed my order over and over and there was never a problem. I would definitely use them again.
